items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great style, great color (wine), and great value
items.body: Perfect style, fit, color, length for a tall girl. Absolutely LOVE having pockets and a light fabric with stretch. So many compliments wearing this over the holidays. Read more
items.author: Coach Cherise

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get one!!
items.body: Great fit!! Comfy. Classy. True to size. Will buy more. Read more
items.author: Dede

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and stretchy
items.body: Buy the dress! Seriously its stretchy so if you want it more revealing size down im usually a extra large I bought a large..the skirt is loose so it covers everything lower 5'3 190ilbs I have so many cute photos and videos but the top is to revealing Read more
items.author: Candis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it!!
items.body: I love it!! Feels great.. nice and flowy. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent dress. Two pieces. Would purchase again.
items.body: Be aware that this is two pieces. I wore to a wedding that I really did not want my mid section showing but I made it work. Was comfortable but can see through the fabric slightly so if you are in a highly lighted establishment or outside in direct sunlight you may want to wear a slip. Iâ€™m 6â€™1 and 300lbs and it was long enough. Purchased 2x. Read more
items.author: Brittany P.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap quality quick outfit
items.body: Iâ€™m half and half with my feelings on this outfit, it fits good but the quality of the material kind of sucky lol and the red is nice but itâ€™s just cheap quality. Just being honest this is definitely an outfit for one day and thatâ€™s it and make sure you steam your outfit so wrinkly. Read more
items.author: nailzbykimberly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get the outfit!
items.body: I bought this set for a photo shoot and it looks great! The color is NAVY, ordered others that were not actually navy! I wore it to look like a dress instead of 2 pieces! I will be wearing it as a crop set though ðŸ˜‚ Read more
items.author: Jevon McGruder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy, beautiful color and true to size.
items.body: This set is beautiful and so stretchy. Made for a comfortable evening. The skirt is a tad long as I'm 5'4 and 175 lbs. I ordered a Large which fit perfect and true to size for me. I could have gotten a medium for a more tight fit since there is a lot of stretch. I had so many stops and compliments on this outfit. The color was vibrant and as described. Read more
items.author: Bamm Johnson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 0814-black Red, 0814-red Blue, 0814-denim Print, 0813-black, 0813-blue, 0814-orange, 0814-black Beige, 0813-dark Green, 0813-wine Red, 0814-black White Dot, 0814-black White Stripe, 0814-khaki, 0813-purple, 0814-rose Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
